Zlatan has signed for Manchester united. His proposed move to united was completed after the Euro exit of Sweden.

string-array.name: cars1
string-array.item: img4
The new car BMW i8 launched in the market at price of 2.5 Crore
The BMW has brought in a new car in the market, the brand new BMW i8, for a whooping price of 2.5 Crore. This car is available in the stores of Mumbai only.

string-array.name: cars2
string-array.item: img5
Get all the info about the new BMW i8
The car is available in the stores of Mumbai only. It has an engine of 50 Horse power and a 2.5 litre tank.

string-array.name: entertainment1
string-array.item: img6
Leanardo Di Caprio wins Oscar for the Best Actor.
Finally Leonardo Di Caprio has won the Oscar for his role in the movie The Reverant. He won the oscar after 23 years of hard work in this industry.
